tweet: It's actually my second time in this role, since I served on President Bush’s AAPI Commission too. Also, I’m so pleased at the appointment of Papaliitele David Cohen, former head of Insular Affairs for the Interior Dept.

Talofa! I’m humbled to serve on the President's Advisory Commission on Asian Americans and Pacific Islanders, as the only Commissioner living in a US Territory, & the only one currently living in the Pacific region (beyond the US west coast)... pic.twitter.com/BZjh764Re1

Talofa! Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. said, "The time is always right to do what is right." On Monday, we celebrate the memory and legacy of America's great civil rights leader. (Pictured here with my friend Dr. Alveda King)  https://radewagen.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/amata-s-statement-honor-martin-luther-king-jr-day … pic.twitter.com/Yj79EMpuCY

Talofa! I appreciate attempts to get negotiations going for a fully open government. Seeking finish line for Storm Gita Medicaid & nutrition assistance for American Samoa https://radewagen.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/amata-welcomes-proposal-end-shutdown …

Talofa! Always great to sit down with our Veterans in American Samoa and discuss what matters most to them, then take those priorities back to Washington  https://radewagen.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/amata-meets-veterans-town-hall-forum-update-them-va-and-federal-services … pic.twitter.com/F9SUaDQLXX
